content:
Based on our previous conversation, can you help me write the content for section 5 about Why You Need a Commercial Contract Lawyer
Importance of having a commercial contract lawyer
How a lawyer can help you avoid disputes and protect your interests

For your reference, here is the old content to rewrite:
Who can help with Commercial Contracts?
A construction lawyer can be your best choice to consult your commercial building contracts. A building and construction lawyer offers a wide range of services including construction contracts services. Seeking the assistance of a legal expert can help you minimise the chances of getting in trouble with the other party.

Learn More: Building Contract Dispute Lawyer >

Please adjust the word count to 150 words. I intend to give you the next section, so do not give a summary or conclusion yet.

Please respond to me in Australian English.
